meanings.definition: The act of adding something extra to something else.
meanings.sent1: She made superadditions to her outfit by adding a sparkly brooch.
meanings.sent2: The chef made superadditions to the recipe by including a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent3: The party planner's superadditions to the decorations made the event even more festive.
meanings.sent4: His superadditions to the conversation brought new perspectives to light.
meanings.sent5: The artist's superadditions to the painting transformed it into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: An additional amount or quantity added to something.
meanings.sent1: The superadditions to the budget were unexpected but welcome.
meanings.sent2: The superadditions to the team improved their chances of winning.
meanings.sent3: The superadditions to the dessert table were quickly devoured by the guests.
meanings.sent4: The superadditions to the collection made it even more valuable.
meanings.sent5: The superadditions to the garden enhanced its beauty and charm.
